title: Strongest Equity Market Growth
description: In 2022, Turkey's equity market experienced an exceptional growth rate of 105.78%, the highest increase globally according to S&P Global Equity Indices.

title: Significant Financial Outflows
description: In 2023, Turkey faced a net financial outflow of $707.83 million, marking one of the lowest financial inflow performances globally.

title: Decline in Inventory Levels
description: Turkey saw a substantial decrease in inventory levels in 2023, with a reduction valued at $21.16 billion, the lowest recorded globally.
